reviews.review_msg: Hands down the best professor I've had at SFU! He really cares about the subject and his students. Class discussion is encouraged, so come prepared and expect a fun and engaging lecture. He's readily available for help, is a fair marker, and keeps the material interesting. Plus, he's hilarious. Overall, an A+ professor. :)

Hands down the best professor I've had at SFU! Really cares about the subject and his students, lectures are never boring. Class discussions are generally expected so do your reading and you'll have no problem. He's very helpful and accessible in office hours. Plus, he's hilarious. A+ professor. :)

Coley is by far the best prof I've ever had at SFU. He's a fair marker, hilarious, and engaging. He's always willing to help his students; he really challenges you to think critically and to read the texts with a deeper analysis. I'm really going to miss this class, and I highly recommend taking a course with him.

Best prof @ SFU imo. Incredibly knowledgeable. Very passionate, enthusiastic about the subject. He's witty, cheerful, very helpful, flexible and understanding. We covered the Pearl Manuscript poems, each was really interesting especially since the prof encourages a very in depth anaylsis of them. Participation is a must. Hard marker but he's fair.

David Coley is an unbelievably amazing professor. The class was interesting and engaging, and assignments allow for critical thinking instead of just regurgitation of the material. He's available and cares about helping his students. I have never been so sad to leave a class behind. Highly, highly recommended - you won't regret it.

I highly recommend taking an English course with David Coley.  He is intelligent, entertaining, thoughtful, helpful and everything else a student could hope for in a professor.  I'm really going to miss this class.

Take his class. You'll be glad you did, and you'll learn a lot. Only twice have I ever had a class at the end of which all the students clap for the prof: both of those classes were taught by David Coley. He's a legend.

I love Anne.  She makes boring subjects interesting. Her assignment feedback is encouraging and makes you want to do well. She cares about the outcome of her students. I wish she could be my professor for every subject.
If you are willing to put forth the effort, you will never have a Professor more dedicated to helping you learn than Dr. Anne Higgins.

Dr. Didicher is AWESOME. She cares about the success of her students & is always willing to help, thoroughly knowledeable, includes interesting activities to keep class fun. Humble, sweet prof. Don't miss classes & pay attention, participate. I really enjoyed everything we covered (Pope poetry). She even gives grammar tips to help you write better!
